Go on an exciting journey through the Druid lands and save The Golden Tome of knowledge and magic in this Match 3 game! Containing all of the Druidsâ knowledge that has been collected for six centuries, The Golden Tome must be protected from those greedy villains who would use its power for evil! Help Aidan explore mystic locations and locate the legendary tablet in The Legend of the Golden Tome! Gripping gameplay; Protect the Golden Tome!
